welcome-dialog.message: Thank you for joining! Please let us know your name. First name is fine--it's just so we can label your spot(s) at the table.
welcome-dialog.title: Welcome to Blackjack!

dealer-rules.stand: Dealer must draw to 16 and stand on all 17s
